text: Callington is a town and civil parish in Cornwall. It is near the River Tamar, and about seven miles (11 km) north of Saltash and nine miles south of Launceston. 5,876 people live there. Lots of people in Callington work for Ginsters making pasties.Ordnance Survey: Landranger map sheet 201 Plymouth & Launceston ==References== Category:Towns in Cornwall Category:Civil parishes in Cornwall Category:Market towns in England
title: Callington, Cornwall
